Articles.Content: I\'m proud to pronounce that Mun Lab 1 has successfully touched down on the Munar surface. Now I\'m trying to make a landing in a crater at 70oN. It requires NovaPunch, MechJeb, & .16. ;D

...Mun Lab 1 has successfully touched down on the Munar surface...

When speaking of Kerbals that can mean everything from hitting the mun with escape velocity to softly touching it with right landerside down ;P

Can you post a few images of the lander? Looks quite interesting.
I\'m trying to get it on Minmus right now. ;P
